## Source: ossf-package-analysis (80d5f0fae64f9ea46cc8e1c401dac2109bdf35aedbca211a71890a83dec4722f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'wordpress-theme-core' @ 0.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
